analytic.title: A Collection of Syriac Short Stories about Early Church Fathers

monogr.title: Philomathestatos: Studies in Greek and Byzantine Texts Presented to Jacques Noret for his Sixty-Fifth Birthday / Études de patristique grecque et textes byzantins offerts à Jacques Noret à l’occasion de ses soixante-cinq ans

body.bibl: Ebied, Rifaat Y., and Lionel Ralph Wickham. “A Collection of Syriac Short Stories about Early Church Fathers.” In Philomathestatos: Studies in Greek and Byzantine Texts Presented to Jacques Noret for His Sixty-Fifth Birthday / Études de Patristique Grecque et Textes Byzantins Offerts à Jacques Noret à l’occasion de Ses Soixante-Cinq Ans, edited by Bart Janssens, Bram Roosen, and Peter van Deun, 225–37. Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 137. Leuven: Peeters / Departement Oosterse Studies, 2004.

Rifaat Y. Ebied and Lionel Ralph Wickham, A Collection of Syriac Short Stories about Early Church Fathers, in Philomathestatos: Studies in Greek and Byzantine Texts Presented to Jacques Noret for His Sixty-Fifth Birthday / Études de Patristique Grecque et Textes Byzantins Offerts à Jacques Noret à l’occasion de Ses Soixante-Cinq Ans, ed. Bart Janssens, Bram Roosen, and Peter van Deun, Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 137 (Leuven: Peeters / Departement Oosterse Studies, 2004), 225–37.
